column3: Ah, you got coins? Coins very tasty... I mean, useful! For me! For trade.
You need heart? You lose heart? Hmm... I fix. Good trade!
Ah, I take 2 heart, you take 3 heart. Fair, yes?
Good deal! You give 3 heart, I give 4 heart.
This? Very rare! Very special! Very... common actually, but still special for you.
One moon? Easy trade. You want two moons? Hmm... harder.
No refunds! Unless... actually, no, no refunds.
